mapper.select: select a.seq ,a.rcStatus ,a.rcRegDateTime ,a.rcModDateTime ,a.rcQuantity ,a.rcDelNy ,a.factory_seq ,a.grocery_seq from Receiving a JOIN factory fc ON fc.seq = a.factory_seq JOIN grocery gc ON gc.seq = a.grocery_seq where 1=1 ORDER BY a.seq desc
SELECT seq ,rcStatus ,rcQuantity ,rcDelNy ,factory_seq ,grocery_seq FROM Receiving WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE receiving SET rcDelNy = 1 ,modDateTime = now() WHERE seq = #{seq}
